About Us

Here at Whisky International we are passionate about whisky and our mission is to provide our customers with the very best whisky at very competitive prices with excellent customer service. Whisky International is located in Scotland’s capital city close to the iconic Edinburgh Castle.

Over recent years we have developed contacts in distilleries around the world to ensure that we are among the first to have the latest releases available.

We specialise in those hard find and distillery only releases that you won’t find anywhere else. You will also find a great selection of popular classics including many travel retail and duty free exclusives available.

If there is a particular whisky you are looking for then please let us know. If you are a drinker, a collector or an investor, we are dedicated to helping you make the right decisions about selecting the right whisky for your needs.

Pre-owned collectable bottles

We also have a collection of pre-owned bottles available for sale that are of excellent quality and would appeal to those people looking for a rare limited edition either to drink or to collect. These bottles have been fully inspected and a detailed description and photographs are included. If you require any more information on these bottles then please e mail sales@whiskyinternationalonline.com

Auction management service

We also provide an Auction Management Service were required. If you are looking for a whisky that is currently in auction then we will visit the auction house to report on the quality of the bottle(s) with photographs to ensure you are fulling briefed on the bottle condition before purchase. We can also manage the bid process for you up to your agreed limit. Please e mail us to discuss your requirements on sales@whiskyinternational.com.

If there is a particular whisky that you are looking for then please send your details to sales@whiskyinternationalonline.com

Rare whisky sourcing

If you are looking for a whisky that is particularly rare and hard to find we have an extensive network of contacts at distilleries, wholesalers, stockists and individual collectors that could have this available. Just e mail over the details to sales@whiskyinternationalonline.com

Vat Free

If you are based outside the European Union then you will pay our VAT exclusive prices! When you go to the check to purchase we will automatically remove the VAT from your items.

If you are based outside the UK but have a valid European VAT number then you can enter this at checkout and VAT will be removed from your items.

Shipping

We have extensive experience in shipping all types of whisky bottles including decorative boxes all over the world and use specialist packing materials to ensure your bottle is protected in transit. Please allow a little extra time for the packaging to be complete for more bespoke bottles.Once packed we use an internationally renowned courier to get your purchase delivered in the quickest possible time. To keep you fully updated you will receive an e mail from the courier when your whisky is despatched allowing you to track it all the way to your door. If the whisky is a present, then please let us know and we can arrange gift wrapping.

Once packed we use an internationally renowned courier to get your purchase delivered in the quickest possible time. To keep you fully updated you will receive an e mail from the courier when your whisky is despatched allowing you to track it all the way to your door. If the whisky is a present, then please let us know and we can arrange gift wrapping.

Delivery Timescales

UK & Europe – next day up to 48 hours
Middle East – 48 hours
US – East Coast 1 to 2 days, West Coast 2-3 days
Far East – 2 to 3 days
Australia and New Zealand – 2 to 4 days

These timescales are a guide from our experience but small delays can occur as goods clear through customs. Any taxes or duties that relate to your purchases will be the responsibility of the recipient.

If you have any questions regarding shipping to your country, then please e mail us on sales@whiskyinternationalonline.comy renowned courier to get your purchase delivered in the quickest possible time. To keep you fully updated you will receive an e mail from the courier when your whisky is despatched allowing you to track it all the way to your door. If the whisky is a present, then please let us know and we can arrange gift wrapping.
